showerReviews.reviewText: We enjoyed our stay but the bathroom was really bad. With only one bath house (4 shower stalls and 4 toilet stalls) and one restroom (3 toilet stalls) for the entire campground, both of which are on the main road, it was really inconvenient …

… back, but I surely loved it. Located in Apex. I always stay walking distance to a restroom and it was nice, hot inside, but nice...like 4 stalls and a shower and sinks with no soap. I took a shower on my site because it was 90 …

… close to playgrounds. We were close to the water, so early in the morning I woke up to do yoga. We enjoyed the day out on the boat and returned to shower and cook. The restroom locations are mostly maintained cleaned. Some people just can't …

… very friendly and awesome firewood for $5! The campground is all gravel, hard to put pegs in. To my surprise the shower waster is pretty warm! The only negative things is that the camp sites are very close to each other, not even many trees …
Nice campground, with nice roomy sites, and clean and friendly staff.  Although the bathroom could really sure a update. Especially the shower area with a little privacy  would be great.

… to go camping. There are a lot of fun things to do: swimming, boating, hiking and more. The area, including the toilet and shower rooms, is safe, kept clean and is well-maintained. The beach is kids friendly. Highly recommended for a …
… Plenty of beautiful sites! The shower building was great, and the other bathroom was mehhhhhh.... could use a cleaning. But we knew it was the off season. …

… We did experience power outages, but the campground sent repair folks within half an hour and had the problem fixed. The shower facilities could use updating. There are no benches and only one hook on the back of the door to hang things on. …
Come here all the time. The staff here are awesome, campsites are great. Shower house is a little cold in winter lol but I love this place

locations.title: Triangle Aquatic Center / TAC TITANS
locations.content: Triangle Aquatic Center / TAC TITANS may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Very disappointing open swim hours for recreational swimmers.
The women's locker room is disgusting, mold in the showers, shower curtains dirty and moldy. At least 4 showers broken.
… Tried my first day today, February 19. What a disaster! Kids in men's locker room talking loud about drugs and being nasty. Shower dirty. …

… is why they exist! But! The women's locker room is dreadful. I cannot speak for the men's locker room. Mildew reigns in the shower area with strands of long hair stuck to the wall. A DEEP cleaning would set a standard in keeping it cleaner. …

… where you can enter together with the child of other sex. But if you want the kid to take a shower or need a locker, you must send her/him alone to the "adult" locker/shower/bathroom. I don't know how other parents deal with it, maybe this …

… .   Only one friendly lifeguard, others are not.  Front desk no one answer phone.  The shower room is dirty, tiles fell off, no soap,  and half of the showers are not functioning.  I like to see some improvement in the shower room. …

… and ants) and molds. The shower curtains and shower stalls, in particular, have a thriving colony of mold and, with the broken tiles and soap dispensers, appear to have been under flood waters for several weeks.  Rumor is they changed the …
For school events, I'm sure it's great. The pools are big and there are many of them. However, it's very rundown. The shower curtains are falling down, small and have mold.
The locker rooms needs new shower heads.
